mapper.select: select id, name, username, password, phone, level_id, birthday, inviter_id, address, postcode, membership_number, last_deal_time, create_time, disabled, remark from client where username = #{username} and password = #{password};
mapper.update: update membership_number set number = #{number}, disabled = #{disabled} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select mn.id, mn.number, mn.disabled from membership_number as mn, client as c where mn.number = c.membership_number;
select id, number, disabled from membership_number where number = #{number} and disabled = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into client_level (name, price_type, price) values (#{name}, #{priceType}, #{price});
mapper.update: update client_level set name = #{name}, price_type = #{priceType}, price = #{price} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select count(0) from client_level;
select id, name, price_type, price from client_level limit #{start}, #{pageSize};
select id, name, price_type, price from client_level;
select cl.id, cl.name, cl.price_type, cl.price from client_level as cl, client as c where cl.id = c.level_id;
mapper.insert: insert into client (id, name, username, password, phone, level_id, birthday, inviter_id, address, postcode, membership_number, last_deal_time, create_time, disabled, remark) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{levelId}, #{birthday}, #{inviterId}, #{address}, #{postcode}, #{membershipNumber}, #{lastDealTime}, #{createTime}, #{disabled}, #{remark});
mapper.delete: delete from client where id = #{id} and level_id > 0;
mapper.update: update client set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, postcode = #{postcode} where id = #{id};
update client set disabled = #{disabled}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id} and level_id > 0;
update client set last_deal_time = now() where id = #{id} and level_id > 0;
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.username, c.password, c.phone, c.level_id, c.birthday, c.inviter_id, inviter.name AS inviterName, inviter.phone AS inviterPhone, c.address, c.postcode, c.membership_number, c.last_deal_time, c.create_time, c.disabled, c.remark FROM client AS c LEFT JOIN client AS inviter ON inviter.id = c.inviter_id WHERE c.level_id > 0 and c.disabled = 0 AND c.id = #{id};

SELECT c.id AS clientId, c.name AS clientName, s.id AS storeId, s.name AS storeName, IF (sum(sro.order_money) IS NULL, 0, sum(sro.order_money)) AS totalMoney, IF (sum(scd.change_push_money) IS NULL, 0, sum(scd.change_push_money)) AS totalPushMoney FROM client AS c LEFT JOIN sell_apply_order_${storeId} AS sao ON sao.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sell_result_order_${storeId} AS sro ON sro.apply_order_id = sao.id LEFT JOIN store_client_detail AS scd ON ( scd.order_id = sro.id AND scd.type IN (3, 4) ) LEFT JOIN store AS s ON s.id = #{storeId} WHERE c.level_id > 0 AND c.disabled = 0 AND c.inviter_id = #{clientId} GROUP BY c.id;

SELECT c.id AS clientId, c.name AS clientName, s.id AS storeId, s.name AS storeName, sro.create_time, sro.order_money AS totalMoney, scd.change_push_money AS totalPushMoney FROM client AS c INNER JOIN sell_apply_order_${storeId} AS sao ON sao.client_id = c.id INNER JOIN sell_result_order_${storeId} AS sro ON sro.apply_order_id = sao.id INNER JOIN store_client_detail AS scd ON ( scd.order_id = sro.id AND scd.type IN (3, 4) ) INNER JOIN store AS s ON s.id = #{storeId} WHERE c.level_id > 0 AND c.disabled = 0 AND c.id = #{clientId};
mapper.insert: insert into store_client (store_id, client_id, integral, advance_money, push_money) values (#{storeId}, #{clientId}, #{integral}, #{advanceMoney}, #{pushMoney});
mapper.update: update store_client set integral = integral + #{integral} where store_id = #{storeId} and client_id = #{clientId} and integral + #{integral} >= 0;
update store_client set advance_money = #{advanceMoney} where store_id = #{storeId} and client_id = #{clientId} and advance_money = 0;
update store_client set push_money = push_money + #{pushMoney} where store_id = #{storeId} and client_id = #{clientId} and push_money + #{pushMoney} >= 0;
mapper.select: select id, store_id, client_id, integral, advance_money, push_money from store_client where store_id = #{storeId} and client_id = #{clientId};
mapper.insert: insert into store_client_detail (store_id, client_id, create_time, update_time, type, change_integral, change_push_money, order_id, status, user_id, withdrawal_way, remark) values (#{storeId}, #{clientId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{type}, #{changeIntegral}, #{changePushMoney}, #{orderId}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{withdrawalWay}, #{remark});
mapper.select: select id, store_id, client_id, create_time, update_time, type, change_integral, change_push_money, order_id, status, user_id, withdrawal_way, remark from store_client_detail where id = #{id};
